verses.text:
Be on thy guard, be watchful still, Be on thy guard, be watchful still;
And be on thy guard, though thousand foes Assail thee on thy way, be on thy guard.

Be on thy guard, be watchful still, Be on thy guard, be watchful still;
Though none can harm thee, yet beware, Be on thy guard, though none can harm thee.

Be on thy guard, be watchful still, Be on thy guard, be watchful still;
Thy vigilance can never cease, Be on thy guard, thy vigilance can never cease.

Be on thy guard, be watchful still, Be on thy guard, be watchful still;
Thy armor never lay aside, Be on thy guard, thy armor never lay aside.
